languages.text: "Я бы тоже предпочел сначала восемь часов допрашивать нечисть с применением биомантии. Но надо быть благодарными Императору и за малое".
"I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
languages.original_text: "Я бы тоже предпочел сначала восемь часов допрашивать нечисть с применением биомантии. Но надо быть благодарными Императору и за малое".

traits.locale_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
"I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
"I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
"I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
"I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

languages.text: "Auch ich hätte es vorgezogen, den Wurm zunächst acht Stunden lang mit Hilfe von Biomantie zu verhören, doch wir müssen dem Imperator auch für kleine Segen dankbar sein."
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

traits.locale_text: "Auch ich hätte es vorgezogen, den Wurm zunächst acht Stunden lang mit Hilfe von Biomantie zu verhören, doch wir müssen dem Imperator auch für kleine Segen dankbar sein."

languages.text: « Moi aussi, j'aurais préféré lui faire subir d'abord de longues heures d'interrogatoire et de biomancie, mais nous devons rendre grâce à l'Empereur pour les menus bienfaits qu'Il nous prodigue. »
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, j'aurais préféré lui faire subir d'abord de longues heures d'interrogatoire et de biomancie, mais nous devons rendre grâce à l'Empereur pour les menus bienfaits qu'Il nous prodigue. »

languages.text: «A mí también me hubiera gustado interrogarlo durante ocho horas mediante biomancia, pero tenemos que agradecer al Emperador las bendiciones que nos da».
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

traits.locale_text: «A mí también me hubiera gustado interrogarlo durante ocho horas mediante biomancia, pero tenemos que agradecer al Emperador las bendiciones que nos da».

languages.text: 「まず生体秘法を使って哀れな男を8時間尋問したかったが、我々は皇帝の小さな恩恵に感謝しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

traits.locale_text: 「まず生体秘法を使って哀れな男を8時間尋問したかったが、我々は皇帝の小さな恩恵に感謝しなければならない」

languages.text: “我也更乐意先用生物法术审讯这个渣滓八个小时，之后再送他上路。不过，我们还是得感谢帝皇赐予我们的小小祝福。”
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

traits.locale_text: “我也更乐意先用生物法术审讯这个渣滓八个小时，之后再送他上路。不过，我们还是得感谢帝皇赐予我们的小小祝福。”

languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."

languages.text: "Ben de ilk önce biyobazlıktan faydalanarak sekiz saat boyunca o alçağı sorgulamayı tercih ederdim. Ancak böyle ufak lütufları için İmparator'a müteşekkir olmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "I too would have preferred eight hours of interrogating the wretch with the use of biomancy first, but we must be grateful to the Emperor for small blessings."
